Package com.m3rcuriel.controve.components

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AngleSensor
    An interface representation of a sensor measuring angular position.
    Clock
    A generalized way to measure current time with generators for system and fpga.
    CurrentSensor
    An abstract interface for an object measuring a current.
    DistanceSensor
    The abstract representation of a sensor measuring distance.
    DriveTrain  
    Motor
    An abstract interface representing a Motor.
    PneumaticsControlModule
    An abstract representation of the Pneumatics Control Module on the robot.
    PneumaticsControlModule.Faults
    A representation of the possible faults on a PCM.
    PowerDistributionPanel
    An abstract representation of a Power Distribution Panel on the robot.
    Relay
    An abstract representation of any object which can switch between on and off.
    ReZeroable
    An abstract interface representing an object which can have a new zero point.
    SimpleAccumulatedSensor
    An abstract representation of a sensor which reads the derivative and accumulates the value.
    Solenoid
    An abstract representation of a linearly actuated solenoid.
    SpeedController
    An abstract representation of anything with a set-able speed.
    SpeedSensor
    An abstract representation of a sensor for speed.
    Switch
    Any readable device which is either active, or inactive.
    TemperatureSensor
    An abstract representation of a sensor for temperature.
    VoltageSensor
    A abstract sensor for voltage.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Motor.Direction
    An enum representing the possible states of the Motor.
    Relay.State
    The set of states possible in a Relay.
    Solenoid.Direction
    Enum representing the possible states of the solenoid.
